title: drop in fps of the new patch
body: after the new patch me and my friend have a drop of fps but my fps is 90 and have a drop after the new patch any body help me plz!!

replies.body:
FPS  issues are usually due to video drivers, or graphic cards not being up to date! No worries though, our[ FPS guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684)should make sure that everything is up to date and working properly. 

If you still run into issues after running through the guide say, "Pika Pi." Three times and I should reappear with a new solution to your issue.
